title: Gas distribution commences after price hike
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Gas cylinders are being received by distributors for the first time since the price hike.
But the shortage of gas cylinders has put the people in a difficult position.
Cooking gas cylinders were delivered to gas dealers in Hikkaduwa for the first time in 15 days today.
A large queue was witnessed in Badulla Town, as people waited for the delivery of cooking gas.
